mapper.select: select pass_comment.comment_no, interview.reg_date, interview.title, interview.writer, pass_comment.passcheck from pass_comment inner join interview on pass_comment.member_info_no = interview.member_info_no where pass_comment.member_info_no=21
select interview_evaluate.evaluate_comment from pass_comment inner join interview_evaluate on pass_comment.member_info_no = interview_evaluate.member_info_no where pass_comment.member_info_no=21
select count(*) from pass_comment where pass_comment.member_info_no=21
select ir_info.name, ir_info.member_info_no from pass_comment inner join ir_info on pass_comment.member_info_no = ir_info.member_info_no where pass_comment.member_info_no=21
